English: Press {0} to type and hold {1} to talk
Description: This is a helper text for the in-game chat. "{0}" represents the designated key for starting to type chat messages. "{1}" represents the designated key for starting to speak over voice chat.

French.Translation: Appuyez sur {0} pour écrire et maintenez {1} enfoncé pour parler.

Italian.Translation: Premi {0} per digitare e mantieni {1} per parlare

German.Translation: Drücken Sie {0} zum Tippen und halten Sie {1} zum Sprechen

Spanish.Translation: Pulsa {0} para escribir y mantén pulsado {1} para hablar

Russian.Translation: Нажмите {0}, чтобы написать, и удерживайте {1}, чтобы сказать

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Aperte {0} para digitar e segure {1} para falar

Polish.Translation: Naciśnij {0}, aby pisać, i {1}, aby mówić

Japanese.Translation: {0} を押して入力、 {1} を長押しして通話

name: GameEventLog.Press_X_ToTypeAnd_Y_ToTalk
